prompt: <description>**Construct a Rectangular Prism with a Cylindrical Hole in the Center. The hole is located at the center of the prism. This will create a New Body Feature for the CAD model. **Shape Description:** * Shape: A rectangular prism with a cylindrical hole in the center. The hole is located at the center of the prism. The prism is made of a solid material. * Length: 0.0682 * Width: 0.75 * Height: 0.75 Now, the first part is ready to be used in building the next parts of the CAD model.</description>
